parameters.name: EcrInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ECR that you want to query.

parameters.name: EcrOwnerId
parameters.description:
The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the ECR belongs.

> If you want to connect to a network instance that belongs to a different account, this parameter is required.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the network instance.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description:
The type of instance. Valid values:

*   **VBR**: queries the permissions that are granted to a VBR.
*   **VPC**: queries the permissions that are granted from a VPC.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return per page. Valid values: **1** to **100**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
A pagination token. It can be used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Valid values:

*   You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.
*   If a value is returned for NextToken, you must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of **NextToken**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the network instance that you want to query.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the network instance belongs.
